title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: run Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma and other LLMs locally with a single CLI or Docker container.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, embed, pull and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; same features as the Python SDK.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration to use any Ollama model as an LLM or embeddings provider.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama (now renamed “Open WebUI”).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with Android support and fluent builder API.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for Ollama; chat, pull, delete and list models.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive CLI wrapper with conversation history, markdown rendering and model switching.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS-Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a GitHub Copilot replacement.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models for generative QA and retrieval pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes: FastAPI backend, RAG with Chroma, function-calling examples, etc.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Official Docker Compose stacks (CPU & GPU) with Open WebUI and volume management.

title: ollama-nestjs
summary: NestJS module providing decorators and services to inject Ollama models into APIs.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate with async/tokio support for chatting and pulling models.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama + Chroma + LangChain in 50 lines of Python.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that streams Ollama replies into threads with slash commands.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin to summarize notes, generate flashcards and answer questions via Ollama.

title: ollama-mistral-axolotl
summary: Fine-tune Mistral 7B with Axolotl and serve the GGUF via Ollama in one repo.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Slack Bolt app that adds /ollama slash command for private or channel chats.
